title: Bug 25295[Dialogs] PropertyPage is not disposed by PropertyPageNode
description: Bug 25295[Dialogs] PropertyPage is not disposed by PropertyPageNode ?Thanks in advance
OB: PropertyPage.dispose() is not called by PropertyPageNode.disposeResources():page is set to null; in PreferenceNode superclass page is disposed before setto null; Is there a reason why page is not disposed in PropertyPageNode (I mustsays it causes some trouble in my code !)
